DOC.brief_summary: In this study the investigators aim to evaluate the utility of a continuous mixed venous saturation monitoring compared to a clinical examination in a group of critically ill patients.
DOC.brief_title: Hemodynamic Monitoring With Mixed Venous Saturation
DOC.detailed_description: We will compare possible difference in terms of sensibility and specificity regarding the continuous mixed venous saturation monitoring compared to clinical examination in a group of critically ill patients.
DOC.criteria: Critically ill patients with a central venous catheter Exclusion criteria: Patients with pulmonary catheter
